text:
Here’s how scientists are designing vaccines that can ditch the fridge

When vaccines don’t have to be kept cold, the results can change the world: Freeze-dried #smallpox #vaccine eradicated smallpox in the 1970s.

#COVID19 #COVID19Aus #COVIDvaccine
